curam.util.ieg.impl
Interface IEGEditorPreEditCallBack

public interface IEGEditorPreEditCallBack

This interface is defined to enforce the application callback class to implement the methods required on the application side. An application can implement these methods to decide if it is possible to edit a script or a question group. These methods are invoked before doing any modification in the IEG Editor. If the call back class is not defined by an application property, editing is allowed by the IEG Editor.

Method Summary
 boolean canEditGroup(java.lang.String groupID)
          This method implementation should check if editing a question group is allowed.
 boolean canEditScript(java.lang.String scriptID)
          This method implementation should check if editing a script is allowed.
 

Method Detail

canEditScript

boolean canEditScript(java.lang.String scriptID)
                      throws AppException,
                             InformationalException,
                             AppRuntimeException
This method implementation should check if editing a script is allowed. It will be invoked before editing a script.

Parameters:
scriptID - the IEG script ID.
Returns:
true if editing is allowed, false otherwise.
Throws:
AppException - Generic exception signature
InformationalException - Generic exception signature
AppRuntimeException - Generic runtime exception wrapper signature

canEditGroup

boolean canEditGroup(java.lang.String groupID)
                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException,
                            AppRuntimeException
This method implementation should check if editing a question group is allowed. The method will be invoked before editing a question group.

Parameters:
groupID - the IEG question group ID.
Returns:
true if editing is allowed, false otherwise.
Throws:
AppException - Generic exception signature
InformationalException - Generic exception signature
AppRuntimeException - Generic runtime exception wrapper signature
